content.question: The satellite orbits at a distance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> from the center of the moon. Which of the following is a correct expression for the time <math alttext="T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> it takes the satellite to make one complete revolution around the moon?

choices.label: <math alttext="T equals 2 pi times the square root of the fraction, R cubed over G lowercase m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T equals 2 pi times the square root of the fraction, R cubed over G uppercase M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T equals 2 pi times the square root of the fraction, G lowercase m over R cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T equals 2 pi times the square root of the fraction, G uppercase M over R cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="T equals 2 pi times the square root of the fraction, R cubed over G uppercase M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
